Overall image quality is high, low wave action, calm sea state and sunny conditions. Classification confidence is high for most areas. Upper intertidal is dominated by sparse eelgrass. This area has lower confidence due to uncertainty in mapping low density distribution of eelgrass.

Overall image quality is medium-high. Overcast conditions and higher turbidity obscured the deep edge which was delineated based on concurrently collected towed video data. Classification confidence for the intertidal extent is high and medium for the subtidal extent.
Overall image quality is high, no wave action, calm sea state. Classification confidence is high. Subtidal edge was visible and confirmed with towed underwater video.

Overall, the effort to delineate eelgrass at this site was high due to the size of the site, but good image quality and conditions on the flight days allowed for confident delineation of both upper and subtidal extents of eelgrass at the site.
label_qc_notes: very good imagery - interesting to see how this would fare as a test dataset since there are large sparse but clearly discernible parts of the bed. I think a segmentation algorithm would pick out more details than what was originally delineated

notes: The imagery for Beck shows some regions obscured by shadow in the intertidal region in the eastern portion of the site. Despite the shadows, the full extent of the bed (including the subtidal edge) was visible in the imagery. The subtidal edge of the bed was distinct and easy to delineate. The towed video indicated the presence of very sparse eelgrass (with shorter blades) in the upper intertidal, which was difficult to delineate due to the presence of shadows.
label_qc_notes: shadows and diffuse/sparse eelgrass is challenging

notes: Turbid water during image acquisition made identifying the subtidal edges in the eastern bed difficult.

Eelgrass present in the shallow (east) end of the site was detectable in the orthomosaic (eelgrass extent delineated using OBIA). Very sparse eelgrass and eelgrass present in deeper reaches of the site were not discernable in the imagery and were manually delineated.
label_qc_notes: imagery has cloud reflections but would use

notes: Very sparse eelgrass in the intertidal and dense algae in the subtidal make eelgrass mapping at this site particularly challenging. Good quality imagery was acquired in 2021.

Overall image quality is medium/high, no wave action, calm sea state. However, imagery was impacted by low clouds and fog making it difficult to discern subtidal eelgrass edge in places. Towed underwater video data collected simultaneously to the drone survey were used to help determine subtidal edge.
